author: brane
msg: Avoid warnings about early expansion of AC_PROG_CC and AC_PROG_CXX; and
instead of propagating inital CFLAGS and CXXFLAGS, just remember them for later.
- Call AC_PROG_CC and AC_PROG_CXX directly, then their mode-setup
SVN_PROG_CC, do not call AC_PROG_CC and only set CMODEFLAGS.
(SVN_CXX_MODE_SETUP): Renamed from SVN_PROG_CXX, do not call

author: brane
msg: Propatgating C(XX)FLAGS from the environment was a mistake.
Revert the part wher they were expanded in Makefile.in.
* Makefile.in: Remove use of CUSERFLAGS and CXXUSERFLAGS.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Added normalize() method to GeneralDirectPosition and GeneralEnvelope.
